EmailTemplate.subject: Last Days to Protect Your Sky Connect Tracker System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.mascoservice.com/]]>
Protect your investment today before it’s too late
Your avionics are a big investment - an investment worth protecting. The Honeywell Maintenance Service plan for Avionics offers full coverage for all Honeywell helicopter avionics – because the unexpected does happen. So, avoid unplanned maintenance costs, downtime and unnecessary stress. After all, when it comes to your aircraft, time is money. Don’t delay, contact MASCO by phone today at (337) 242-1653 <tel:(337) 242-1653> to get a customized plan for your helicopter.
CONTACT MASCO ONLINE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201905_MASCO_SkyConnect.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_ds_masco-happ&utm_content=customer+form+fill]]>
